roleset.name: putting into new words, wording again

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Yet , unlike the others , I am not starting a new thread to reword the same old points .

example.name: All args
example.text: i reworded it as "Chosen actions" I meant she purposefully performed the actions, not purposefully.

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Is their rewording it going to make it any different?
